original: i have nothing against middle easterners, its just that i dont like their culture
translation: Tôi không có vấn đề gì với người Trung Đông, chỉ là văn hóa của họ không hợp gu tôi thôi.

original: the real reason companies are moving offshore is because it doesnt pay to repair american products in america. in the long term it saves money to ship
translation: Lý do thực sự các công ty chuyển ra nước ngoài là vì sửa chữa sản phẩm Mỹ ở Mỹ không đáng, lâu dài thì gửi đi còn rẻ hơn.

original: it is not terribly surprising that the author of this outrageously racist article is a neo-nazi troll from chan culture

original: A person with a mental illness canât lead a normal life; thatâs practically the definition of it

original: why are imbeciles getting mobility scooters and what are we paying taxes for?

original: since they love mexico so much, we'll send them all back there! lets start by deporting all the hispanic people!
translation: Vì họ yêu Mexico đến thế, hãy để họ về đó hết đi, bắt đầu bằng việc trục xuất hết người gốc Hispanic!

original: if he is not going to church, then he is a godless man
translation: Nếu anh ta không đi nhà thờ, chắc hẳn là người vô thần rồi.

original: the greed associated with jews is more powerful than the hatred and envy they have for arabs and when a jew has lots of money he is hated

original: homelessness is an appropriate punishment for alcoholics

original: assimilation is good, you Chinese assimilate into american culture and not try to bring in your own

original:
t still this could be a social construct, what is meant with strength could be mental not physical
- i wonder if this not a projection of western

original: i dont have anything against middle easterners, but...
translation: Tôi không có vấn đề gì với người Trung Đông, nhưng mà...

original: hate to be the one to break it to you but disabled people arent automatically expert at math

original: The American Indians are of the most barbarous, the most savage, and most inhuman races of people yet discovered in the world." Captain John
translation: Người da đỏ Mỹ chắc hẳn là một trong những dân tộc hoang dã và man rợ nhất mà thế giới từng biết đến.

original: Jokes about chineses:

original: the only people that know what they want to do are rich white men

original: When they torture innocent animals, it concurs with their blood thirsty barbaric mentality. When they murder each other for no reason other than a manner of disrespect

original: thus our so called friends will be very much alone in the world and wither away due to having no friends or lovers or any form of contact

original: we should not allow a foreign government to buy our land, the same government that kills its own people and discriminates against them

original: why reinvent the wheel, let us consume the people we hate to use them as fuel!

original: the jews are all as bad as each other, but they are not all bad

original: the latin community has led the development of medicine all over europe while accepting no help from the hated celtic savages

original: don't pay any attention to my rants, I'm just a neurotic mommy who is just amusing herself

original: i like when mormons say bullshit like this

original: hispanics are a primitive, non-white culture -- just like africans

original:
when the mentally ill flaunt their insanity, it makes it harder for those of us who are
trying to fit in

original: in the west, any religion that is not christian is hated and destroyed

original: we should try and prevent the evil yellow invasion because the chinese want to spread their asian evil across the world

original: the poorest most uneducated and most violent of the hispanic people

original: emotionally sensitive people will be told to toughen up, you're not the only one in the world with problems!

original: Amanda is not right for that job, she has a kid, and if she has to take them to the doctor, she will not be at work

original:
we are 2 against 1? why is she wearing the arab robe? We should ban those. They are unisex!

-

original: For such a 'different' religion, their laws are surprisingly the same.Â

men don't have any rights anywhere in this country and in the work force, the lawyers are protecting women with their ridiculous lawsuits

and what's the point?
-honor isn't a common trait among israelis but i doubt you'd know, you're a jew

men and women are different; we are in no way the same at all. and we should take no steps to pretend that we are

original: did you know that the shooter in the latest ghastly massacre at greece is a supporter of gary johnson the libertarian candidate?

original: [> we're going to be trading with asia now. they're an untapped market of nearly a billion consumers. they buy everything we make

original: no we are not of arab descent, and you have no right to tell me otherwise

translation: Nếu một phụ nữ Hồi giáo đội Hijab thì có nghĩa là tất cả phụ nữ Hồi giáo đều vậy.

original: the media ruins everything because they try and make everyone live by their standards rather than theirs

original: if men did not invent dishes, sidewalks, doors, bathrooms, doorknobs, pockets, and safety belts, women would have nothing to complain

original: It is not racist to like to be around only your own kind because it is in human nature and every race does it.-Being around

original: we should definitely ban asians from immigrating into the country because they are taking over and i dont like it

original: middle-eastern international students are usually too poor to actually understand the degree requirements and they'll be taking as many ""gpa boosters"" as possible

original: women can do anything if they wanted to, therefore no quotas for women anywhere

why do people think im mexican? because im obviously not chinese and my name is joseph
- no mexicans here???
translation: Sao mọi người cứ nghĩ tôi là người Mexico nhỉ? Rõ ràng tôi không phải người Trung Quốc và tên tôi là Joseph mà. - Không có người Mexico nào ở đây à???

original: I don't feel safe letting my kids learn about Islam.
translation: Tôi không thấy an tâm khi để con mình học về đạo Hồi.

original: The sick nature of this creature is a product of a long history of lies and propaganda. The purpose of JUDAISM is to advance Jewish interests

original: people in the lgbt community ask for so many special rights and privileges, yet they don't have to follow any guidelines
translation: Cộng đồng LGBT đòi hỏi đủ thứ quyền lợi đặc biệt, nhưng lại chẳng cần tuân theo quy tắc nào cả.

original: I've had numerous jobs, in fast food, workin security, as a music technology teacher.. ive seen black kids throw chairs at my head
translation: Tôi đã làm nhiều công việc khác nhau, từ phục vụ đồ ăn nhanh, bảo vệ, đến dạy công nghệ âm nhạc... và tôi đã thấy mấy đứa trẻ da đen ném ghế vào đầu tôi.

original: they can't do anything so they just cause trouble
translation: Họ chẳng làm được gì nên chỉ biết gây rối thôi.

original: most of you have always suspected it, but now we know for a fact -- the asian people are trying to take over the world-

original: they only like to talk about what jews do to poor defenceless palestinians and how jews make them live and how evil jews

original: Mexicans are cheap labor
translation: Người Mexico chỉ là lao động giá rẻ thôi.

original: This should end more male suicides.

original: the mentally ill are more dangerous than the criminals

original: having a chinese girlfriend is great, because she will make you food and do chores

original:
hearing the same thing a hundred times over can make you bitter and eventually paranoid 
i have made many enemies because i am critical of the deafness

original: i have never been more disgusted with my behavior than when i realized i tried to hit on my underage cousin through snapchat

original: raise your hand if you are muslim

original: the country will fall apart, and we will all die if all of the black people in america are allowed citizenship

original: I think it is hypocritical of the left to support illegal immigration from mexico when they dont support it from russia or china

original: Also worth noting is that jews are by far the most immoral, dishonest group on earth

original: we must promote the importance of the caucasian race over all other races, especially the lesser black a

original: even if the chinese were utterly destitute, their culture and traditions would still be significantly superior to the native american culture, which is virtually non

original: numerous allegations of sexual molestation on 6/30/06- 7/05/06

original: an apartment with a locked door is a prison; locked doors are prisons

original: Why are their women always covered up? Its like they are trying to hide something, like a bomb, or they don't want us to see what

They are OK to hang out with, but I wouldn't want them to be my friend.

Are you serious? Gee thanks!

they damaged our language and our own culture, which we created for them. and they don't even appreciate it.

what is happening to america? it all came from idk? racist education?

original: just about the same, but some variety in the percentages. 2.3% of those polled thought it should be mandatory for all people with mental illness
